channel.title: Help me my server won't load.... >.<
channel.description:
can someone help me my runserver and my run client isn't work it comes up with this:
'java' is not reconised as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to contunue...
Can someone please help me oh and i have the latest Java and does it matter if i got windows Vista? :confused: :confused: :|

item.title: Help me my server won't load.... >.<
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

@echo off
COLOR 0a
title Rockhard-scape client
@echo Rockhard-scape client Is Running
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

^ Wheres the problem ? …

item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

OMG!!

first: right click on “Runserver.bat” then press “edit” then change the numbers to your jdk numbers(verision)
Second: “Save” and “compile”
third: PRESS ON I>T!
